mapper.insert: insert into post_like(likenumber , memail, snumber) values (seq_likenumber.nextval, #{memail}, #{snumber})
mapper.delete: delete from post_like where memail=#{memail} and snumber =#{snumber}
mapper.select: select count(*) from post_like where memail=#{memail} and snumber = #{snumber}
select s.simage , s.snumber, s.swriter from self_guide s where s.snumber in (select p.snumber from Post_like p where p.memail = #{memail})
